# WEAPON::REMOVE_ALL_PROJECTILES_OF_TYPE

## Summary
Explode all the projectiles owned by the specified ped of the specified type

## Parameters
* **WEAPON_TYPE** weaponType
* **BOOL** explode = false: Pass in TRUE if you want all projectiles of type WeaponType to detonate

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
If `explode` true, then removal is done through exploding the projectile. Basically the same as EXPLODE_PROJECTILES but without defining the owner ped.
